title: Major Veigar Bug
body: There's a major issue with Veigar's E.  Players on the enemy team immediately _change course to run into the stun walls_, sometimes even flashing/dashing into it.  This is seems to primarily happen in low elo or unranked games.   Does anyone know what's causing this?

replies.body: there is a bug where killing veigar just gives me 18 gold

I concur, mid laners usually become the victims of this major bug.

There's also a strange bug, that really breaks the game, where the good veigars are always on the team opposing yours
experiencing this bug myself, my cursor just suddenly goes to the veigar stun wall when i right click and when i try to flash over, i get stunned anyways.
~~I mean low elo people suck at this game and decide to dash into whatever they think is safe~~ ohhh its memes and games
why is it in black and white?
Enemies? Don't you mean my teammates?
I still wish that M&G board name was rainbow so i could differentiate it from gameplay.
